title: Fiery Tales Happy Handing
description: I keep getting emails from returning readers on my website, asking me to make the stories available in eBook format. They mentioned that although they like to come online and spend time on the site, they want to be able to take the stories with them, whether in their log cabin in the forest, or during that long trip on the plane. Many places or devices are not 100% connected to the internet, and also quite a lot of people I know like to cut off all possible distraction and interruption when they indulge in a sexy story.So ask no more, here it is! The first of a long series of compilation of the best sexy stories of My Pouty Lips. Enjoy them everywhere on your eReader or tablet. Get a life, go offline!Fiery Tales And Happy Handing. One mouth watering title for a compilation of three hot stories that will make you experience different levels of lust and envy.The stories from the Fiery Tales And Happy Handing told so far are: The Librarian’s Secret: Sinful Pleasures, Political Scandal: Dirty Licks, Sinful Kicks, and Twatlight – Jackoff at Dusk (Horny Vampire vs. Hung Wolves).Each story is very different from the other, offering you a variety of situations that will nurture your imagination and wild fantasies. But enough with the talking now, and let the action begin!
author: Angelicka Wallows
